name: SciLifeLab Data Repository
description: Repository for publishing any kind of research-related data, e.g. documents, figures, or presentations.

name: SciLifeLab Data Stewardship Wizard
description: Tool to aid the creation of research data management plans.

name: SciLifeLab Serve
description: Tool allowing to host and share R Shiny apps, Dash apps as well as trained machine learning models (Tensorflow and PyTorch serving).

name: SweFreq
description: This dataset contains whole-genome variant frequencies for 1000 Swedish individuals generated within the SweGen project.

name: The Swedish COVID-19 and Pandemic Preparedness Data Portal
description: Portal devoted to data and resources relevant to COVID-19 and pandemic preparedness research in Sweden.

name: Life Science Research Data Management Guidelines
